artist: Artist: Andrice Arp , et al.; Author: Paul Miller , et al.; Publisher: Neighbor Lady Community Arts Project, Oakland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, full bleed, photomechanic image of shadows on a building printed in color offset lithography with letterpress text on coated paper covers; 136 pp.

title: Kitchen Sink, vol. 1, issue 3: the stalker issue, for people who think too much
